revised_title: Alkylperoxy Radical Isomerization in Hydrocarbon Combustion
tldr: The authors studied the isomerization of alkylperoxy radicals during hydrocarbon combustion, focusing on n-pentane. They found that between 40-50% of the initially formed amylperoxy radicals undergo isomerization, leading to the formation of O-heterocyclic and carbonyl compounds. The results suggest that alkylperoxy radical isomerization plays a significant role in the combustion process.
